channel.title: Peter MacKay
channel.description: Recent news about Peter MacKay, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by Huffington Post Canada
item.description:
Peter MacKay Beer Bong Photo Tweeted By Rick Mercer After Trudeau Pot ...
Justice Minister Peter MacKay was quick to slam Justin Trudeau Thursday after the Liberal leader admitted to HuffPost Canada that he smoked marijuana since becoming an MP in 2008. While Prime Minister Stephen Harper would say only that Trudeau's ...

item.title: Mentioned by NG News
item.description:
Peter MacKay handed justice portfolio
The scales of justice in past years tipped too far away from the victim, says Peter MacKay, and a strong focus in his new portfolio will be to rectify that. The Central Nova MP, formerly minister of defence, was appointed Canada's new Minister of Justice and ...

item.title: Mentioned by Cape Breton Post
item.description:
Peter MacKay headed to justice portfolio in cabinet shakeup
OTTAWA — Stephen Harper is moving Peter MacKay to the federal Justice portfolio, ending his nearly seven-year stint as the country's defence minister. ... Nunavut MP Leona Aglukkaq moved to minister of environment, CanNor and the Arctic Council.
